articles.author: Maria Merano
articles.title: EU tariffs on China-made EV imports start July 5 - TESLARATI
articles.description: The European Union’s (EU) tariffs on China-made battery electric vehicles (BEVs) will be implemented starting Friday, July 5, 2024.
articles.content:
The European Unions (EU) tariffs on China-made battery electric vehicles (BEVs) will be implemented starting Friday, July 5, 2024.

articles.title: EU imposes tariffs of up to 38% on Chinese electric vehicles - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Volkswagen, Europe’s biggest carmaker, warns extra duties will not strengthen Europe’s auto industry.
articles.content: The European Union has imposed extra duties of up to 37.6 percent on imports of electric vehicles (EVs) made in China, the bloc announced, despite Beijings warnings the move would unleash a trade war… [+2604 chars]
